2019-11-08.name: Eiga Sumikko Gurashi: Tobidasu Ehon to Himitsu no Ko

2019-11-22.name: Fragtime
2019-11-22.desc:
* Based on a school life supernatural manga series by Sato.

What would you do if you could stop time? Moritani for one is using her unusual ability to stop time for three minutes a day to observe the people around her. One day, she chooses to "observe" class idol Murakami's panties - only to find herself in a very compromising situation when her classmate turns out to be immune to her power.

Source: M-U

Note: The OVA received a limited theatrical screening in November 2019.

2019-11-22.desc:
* Based on a supernatural shoujo manga by Tamotsu Youko.

Note: Bundled with the limited edition of the 12th manga volume.

2019-11-29.desc: Note: The first part received a screening at France's Japan Expo in July 2019.

2019-11-29.name: Santa Company: Christmas no Himitsu
2019-11-29.desc: Note: A new extended version of Santa Company that features new scenes and an expanded story. The new version is commemorating the 100th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between Japan and Finland.
